problem.markdown:
1. CNC DESKTOP MILLING MACHINE HAS ( ) 1 Axis ( ) 2 Axis (x) 3 Axis ( ) 4 Axis
2. MATERIAL USED FOR MILLING ON DESKTOP MINIMILL MACHINE IS ( ) Modeling Wax ( ) Wood ( ) Brass (x) All of the Above
3. IN 3D MACHINING SLOT DRILLS OR MILLS ARE PREFERRED FOR (x) Roughing Operation ( ) Finishing Operation ( ) Drilling Operation ( ) All of the above
4. ACTUAL MACHINING TIME IN 3D MACHINING WITH MULTI DIRECTIONAL PROFILE CAN BE REDUCED BY (x) Reducing the acceleration/Declaration of tool ( ) Increasing the feed Rate ( ) Increasing the spindle speed ( ) All of the above
5. PREFERABLE FEED RATE IN ROUGHING OPERATION COMPARE TO FINISHING OPERATION IS ( ) Less (x) More ( ) Equal ( ) All of the above
